articles.author: Nic Reuben
articles.description:
Hello reader who is also a reader, and welcome to The Space Between The Days. Missed the streak? Missed it? Missed the weekly Sunday column? Missed my deadline because I bought a new matress yesterday and spent most of the day lounging, limbs akimbo like a petulant starfish making noises no starfish has or will ever make? Missed the streak? You are simply wrong. Time has no bearing here. Here is the column. I've been reading Mark Forsyth's books on words and this very good New Yorker column about Kanye West smashing up an architectural masterpiece. 
 Read more
articles.title: What's on your bookshelf?: Time has no bearing here as we enter the space between the clock hands edition

articles.author: James Archer
articles.description:
I’m actually quite happy with how many of my voted games made it into this year’s Advent Calendar, not least because it proves I am acutely in-touch, and definitely didn’t dedicate at least fifty percent of my 2024 playing time to a late-onset Elden Ring obsession. Point being, I can present to you my almost-made-it picks without malice nor bitterness, unlike my loser colleagues who didn’t get as many in the main list. Nyeh nyeh.
Read more
articles.title: The RPS Selection Box: James’ bonus games of the year 2024

articles.author: Brendan Caldwell
articles.description:
I'm a sucker for a good first-person runabout. I don't need to shoot, but it's sometimes nice to get a sword, or a big whip. As long as I get to be immersed in an adventure. I think that's the big theme of my selection box: being grounded within my player character. I want to feel what it's like to hike through canyons with too much sellable loot in my backpack. I want to park my soul in the head of a scared Scotsman way out of his depth, hundreds of miles from shore. The closer I can comfortably fit in my character's shoes, the more I seem to buy into the world they inhabit. Even if that world is constantly glowing a magnificent crimson. 
Read more
articles.title: The RPS Selection Box: Brendan's bonus games of the year 2024

articles.author: Nic Reuben
articles.description:
If pushed, I’d describe my 2024 gaming habits as eclectic, but that would actually be a lie. All my favourite games for the year are actually very similar: they are all the best. Unfortunately, the realities of sharing website space with several less-correctos means they didn’t all make this year’s advent calender.
 Read more

articles.author: Jeremy Blum
articles.description:
2024 was my first full year at RPS, and as a guides writer, it was a year packed with the sort of games that make you roll your sleeves up, wipe sweat from your brow, and stare up at the sky from the trenches, ruminating on what life is like when you aren't dealing with back-to-back Soulslikes interspersed with gacha games that feature incomprehensible lootbox mechanics.
 Read more
articles.title: The RPS Selection Box: Jeremy's bonus games of the year 2024

The fell moons rise, and in their cold glare emerges a parcel from the dirt. Bloat and gangrene, crimped as if by tourniquet. A dark promise wriggles within. Grip the fibrous handles, feel its jagged soul imprint upon your palm. Now pull! Rend the sinew, tear muscle from bone, hatch their fetid gift! The yoke draws near! Q: Why was the grave robber disappointed when he broke into Ubisoft's tomb?

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
My selection box isn't really a selection box. It's a tray of barely-nibbled leftovers, hastily lifted from my Steam backlog. One of the disadvantages of being news editor, you see, is that I have  developed a goldfish-grade attention span. In my hectic pursuit of the next scoop, or the next Elden Ring update changelog, I snatch and cast aside game demos like a pickpocket speedrunning the checkout line at Harvey Nichols. I'm dimly aware that some of these cast-aside games are Very Good. A few might even deserve to be played for longer than 30 minutes. I feel immensely guilty about that. Perhaps a little... existential, too. I have measured out my life in tutorial levels. 


So! Rather than digging out three of the games I've actually completed this year, such as The Crush House, Death Of A Wish and Mask Quest, I'm going to gamble on recommending a few I've barely scratched, but which sure feel excellent and have attracted a positive critical consensus. If I am false in this assessment, may Horace the Endless Bear bite my head off for my impudence. Let's begin.

 
Read more
articles.title: The RPS Selection Box: Edwin's bonus games of the year 2024

articles.author: RPS
articles.description:
Here we are, the final voyage of 2024. This is the last advent calendar entry of PC gaming website Rock Paper Shotgun. Days elapsed: 24. Writers employed: 8. 
I hope this hurts.
Read more
articles.title: The RPS Advent Calendar 2024, December 24th

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Pavel Tišnovský)
articles.description: Popíšeme si předávání hodnot mezi javascriptovým kódem na jedné straně a funkcemi a metodami naprogramovanými v jazyce Go na straně druhé. Kvůli odlišnému typovému systému obou jazyků se jedná o netriviální problém.
articles.title: Technologie WebAssembly a GopherJS: předávání argumentů mezi Go a JavaScriptem

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Bařina)
articles.description: Multimediální frameworky představují klíčové nástroje pro zpracování a manipulaci s audiovizuálními daty. V tomto článku se nejprve seznámíme s jejich funkcemi a významem, poté se zaměříme na praktické využití FFmpeg.
articles.title: Multimediální frameworky: nízkoúrovňová sada nástrojů FFmpeg

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Filip Zatloukal)
articles.description: Sonda do světa otevřeného softwaru. Dnes si vyzkoušíme aplikaci pro učení, podíváme se na sadu základních vývojářských nástrojů, přizpůsobíme si prostředí GNOME a vytvoříme si grafické vizualizaci souborů dat a funkcí.
articles.title: Softwarová sklizeň (15. 1. 2025): naučte se učit a soustředit se

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Pavel Tišnovský)
articles.description: Nedílnou součástí prakticky všech procesorů je modul pro operace s plovoucí řádovou čárkou. Na platformě IBM PC se jednalo o řadu matematických koprocesorů označovaných čísly 8087, 80287, 80387 a (nepřesně) 80487.
articles.title: Matematické koprocesory na 80×86 pro výpočty s plovoucí řádovou čárkou

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Redakce)
articles.description: Dnešní příspěvek je o tom, jak namísto sofistikovaných testovacích nástrojů používat k testování samotný překladač.
articles.title: Nechte testovat překladač

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Kopřiva)
articles.description: V dnešním díle Postřehů se podíváme na kybernetický útok na slovenský katastr nemovitostí, pokutu pro Evropskou komisi pro porušování GDPR nebo zvýšenou spolupráci Telegramu s policejními složkami…
articles.title: Postřehy z bezpečnosti: kybernetický útok na slovenský katastr nemovitostí

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Filip Zatloukal)
articles.description: Vývoj Absolute Linuxu byl ukončen. Seiya Nuta zveřejnil obsáhlý návod, jak si naprogramovat vlastní operační systém v 1000 řádcích. Lenovo Legion Go S je první oficiálně licencovanou kapesní konzolí se systémem SteamOS.
articles.title: Absolute Linux byl ukončen, konzole Lenovo Legion Go S se SteamOS

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Týden v KDE a poslední novinky před závěrečnými opravování chyb v Plasmě 6.3, o 150 % rychlejší Zink pro hru Everspace, malá oprava pro 12 let starý Intel Haswell, vývojová verze Wine 10.0-rc5 řešící tři desítky chyb.
articles.title: AV1 přes Vulkan Video pro Intel, zrychlení knihovny Zink

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Redakce)
articles.description: Detectron 2 je autory označován za platformu pro detekci objektů, segmentaci a další vizuální úkoly. Co si pod tím ale představit? Jedná se o sadu modelů, které byly pro tyto účely navrženy a trénovány na vybraných datových sadách.
articles.title: Detectron2: jak vlastně funguje

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Podpora Samsung Galaxy S20 a S9 s SoC Exynos 9810 a 990vylepšení ovladače Intel NPU, rychlejší xHCI USB, UHBR režimy pro DisplayPort / Thunderbolt u Panther Lake, úspornější chod Xeonů Granite Rapids a mnohé další.
articles.title: Poslední úpravy pro jádro Linux 6.13, verze 6.14 s rychlejším USB či podporou Intel NPU

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Projekt LACT, který začal jako grafické rozhraní pro nastavování Radeonů na Linuxu, postupem doby přidal i podporu karet Nvidia a nyní přichází na řadu i Intel, a to v rámci nové verze LACT 0.7.
articles.title: LACT, ovládací panely pro GPU na Linuxu přidávají podporu Intel Arc

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Součástí dokumentace projektu Mesa pro ovladače Intel a rozhraní OpenGL a Vulkan je nově řada doporučení, jak co nastavit, aby uživatel dosáhl maximálního výkonu. Do projektu je přidal Caleb Callaway, vývojář grafických ovladačů z Intelu.
articles.title: Doporučené výkonnostní optimalizace pro GPU Intel na Linuxu

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Ve známém nástroji pro synchronizaci souborů Rsync pro unixové systémy bylo odhaleno šest bezpečnostních chyb, z nichž některé lze zneužít ke spuštění libovolného kódu na klientovi. Útočníci mohou převzít kontrolu nad serverem a poté číst i zapisovat libovolné soubory připojených klientů.
articles.title: Rsync má šest bezpečnostních chyb umožňujících vzdálené spuštění kódu

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: GNOME ve verzi 48 konečně nabídne vlastní výchozí hudební přehrávač. Jmenuje se Decibely (Decibels), napsán je v TypeScriptu a využívá GTK4 + libadwaita.Z hlediska GNOME dobré, z hlediska jiných distribucí může volba TypeScriptu působit problém, nicméně univerzální Flatpak na Flathubu funguje spolehlivě.
articles.title: GNOME 48 přinese nový přehrávač hudby Decibely

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Redakce)
articles.description: Pojďte s námi prozkoumat tajuplný svět hackingu a množství jeho jednotlivých zákoutí. Průvodcem na této cestě vám bude zkušený etický hacker s mnohaletou praxí, který se s vámi podělí o své zkušenosti. Připravili jsme pro vás šestidenní online kurz Hacking v praxi, který je z velké části placený úřadem práce.
articles.title: Šestidenní online kurz Hacking v praxi dotovaný úřadem práce

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Vývojáři uvolnili prohlížeč Chrome ve verzi 132, který opravuje šestnáct bezpečnostních chyb. Většina z nich byla objevena komunitou a dva oznamovatelé si za závažné chyby odnesli odměnu sedm tisíc dolarů.
articles.title: Chrome 132 nabízí úpravu nástrojové lišty a sdílení hesel

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: O větší jednotky až menší desítky procent se s novou verzí balíku Compute Runtime 24.52.32224.5 podařilo Intelu zrychlit chod OpenCL úloh na grafických kartách Arc B580 generace Battlemage. V řadě testů zatím zrychlení není takové, aby si B580 vedl lépe než nejvyšší model předchozí generace Arc A770 či i než jeho přímý předchůdce, model Arc A580, nicméně pokrok vpřed je zřetelný.
articles.title: Intel Arc B580 s novým balíkem Compute Runtime v OpenCL zrychluje

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Pro GNOME 48 je jednou z významných novinek chystaná podpora sledování doby strávené u počítače a upozorňování uživatele na nutnost přestávek. Jak bude rozhraní pro uživatele vypadat, nastiňuje o víkendu vydaná alfa verze komponent Mutter a Shell budoucího GNOME 48.
articles.title: Alfa verze GNOME Shell 48 ukazuje, jak bude vypadat varování uživatele sedícího příliš dlouho u PC

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Vyšla nová stabilní verze systému OpenZFS s označením 2.3, která přináší spoustu velmi zajímavých novinek. K dispozici je například „fast dedup“, což je rychlejší deduplikace než jakou nabízel původní kód v OpenZFS. Důležitá je také podpora rozšíření RAIDZ o nová zařízení za běhu a se zachováním redundance i v procesu – včetně možnosti přerušení.
articles.title: OpenZFS 2.3.0 umožňuje rozšiřovat RAIDZ za běhu a vylepšuje deduplikaci

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Začátkem prosince vznikl návrh na způsob distribuce obrazu Fedory pro Windows Subsystem for Linux, který by nebyl v rozporu s filosofií Fedory a licenčními podmínkami microsoftu pro WSL. Tento návrh byl nyní v rámci FESCo (Fedora Engineering and Steering Committee) schválen a Fedora 42 se tak stane první verzí dostupnou pro Windows 11 / WSL 2.0.
articles.title: Schváleno: Fedora 42 bude první verzí pro Microsoft Windows Subsystem for Linux

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Národní superpočítačové centrum IT4Innovations letos čeká upgrade IT infrastruktury, který zajistí společnost Eviden. Oba subjekty v rámci vysoce výkonných počítačů (HPC) spolupracují dlouhodobě. První instalace v ostravském centru proběhla již v roce 2013. Tehdy společnost Bull, nynější Eviden, dodala superpočítač Anselm a o šest let později i Barboru.
articles.title: Ostravské centrum IT4Innovations bude mít nový superpočítač, tentokrát s procesory Intel Granite Rapids

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Mastodon se chystá převést vlastnictví klíčových součástí ekosystému a platformy Mastodon (včetně jména a autorských práv) na novou evropskou neziskovou organizaci, čímž chce zabránit nebezpečí zneužití moci, které hrozí při provozu či ovládání jednou osobou.
articles.title: Mastodon bude spravovat a vyvíjet nová evropská organizace

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Multimediální open source přehrávač VLC, který vznikl v roce 1996, oslavuje 6 miliard stažení. Prezident VideoLAN Jean-Baptiste Kempf na veletrhu elektroniky CES v Las Vegas minulý týden ukázal automatický překlad titulků s pomocí AI do více než 100 jazyků.
articles.title: VLC oslavuje 6 miliard stažení a překlad titulků s AI

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Vilém Sládek)
articles.description: Tým projektu BIRD vydal opravné verze 2.16.1 a 3.0.1. První jmenovaná opravuje chybu v parseru statických ASPA záznamů a několik dalších méně závažných chyb.
articles.title: Vyšly opravné verze BIRD 2 a BIRD 3

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Před rokem byl do jádra navržen ovladač NT Sync. Hry ve Windows často používají NT synchronization API a Wine toto implementuje přes RPC, což je pomalejší.
articles.title: NT Sync byde pravděpodobně v jádře 6.14

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Společnost Facebook vyplatila 100 000 dolarů bezpečnostnímu odborníkovi za objevení chyby, která mu v říjnu 2024 umožnila nepovolený přístup k internímu serveru. Ben Sadeghipour objevil chybu v říjnu 2024 při zkoumání reklamní platformy společnosti Facebook. Chybu využil k provádění příkazů na interním serveru společnosti a fakticky jej tak ovládl.
articles.title: Facebook vyplatil odměnu 100 000 dolarů za průnik do serveru

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Redakce)
articles.description: Keycloak je Identity provider (IDP) a Single Sign On (SSO). Umožní vám spravovat uživatele na jednom místě a vytvořit single sign on – jediné místo pro přihlášení uživatelů. Už nemusíte psát jméno a heslo do každé aplikace zvlášť. Připravili jsme pro vás školení Keycloak SSO, které proběhne 10. a 11. února a zúčastnit se ho můžete online.
articles.title: Keycloak SSO: efektivní správa uživatelů a bezpečné přihlášení (školení)

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Společnost Automattic oznámila, že v reakci na žalobu WP Engine přesouvá své zdroje z přispívání do projektu WordPress. V rámci této změny Automattic dorovná svůj dobrovolnický závazek s dobrovolnickými závazky WP Engine a dalších hráčů v ekosystému, což je přibližně 45 hodin týdně, které jsou v rámci programu Five For the Future považovány za přínos pro celou komunitu, a nikoli pouze pro jednu společnost, píše společnost v oznámení. Tyto hodiny budou pravděpodobně určeny na zabezpečení a kritické aktualizace.
articles.title: Společnost Automattic snižuje množství příspěvků do WordPressu

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Výzkumníci z univerzity v Pensylvánii zkoumali, jakým způsobem se lidé dostávají k informacím na Wikipedii. Zkoumáno bylo asi půl miliónu uživatelů mobilní aplikace Wikipedie z 50 zemí používajících 14 jazyků. Šlo o to, jak uživatelé postupně procházejí odkazy v článcích, což je nazýváno králičí nora.
articles.title: Wikipedie pomohla odhalit tři typy zvídavosti

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: bkralik)
articles.description: Baví vás bastlení, fyzika, IT a nebo prostě cokoliv technického? Proseděli jste celé Vánoce v záři obrazovky počítače a nebo jste o tom alespoň snili? Chcete se pochlubit technickými vánočními dárky? Pak dorazte na Virtuální Bastlírnu - online pokec (nejen) techniků a bastlířů!

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: CEO NVIDIA Jensen Huang v úterý řekl, že kvantové počítače nebudou ještě 20 let moc užitečné. Po tomto sdělení klesly ceny akcií kvantových společností o 4–35 % (Rigetti Computing, D-Wave Quantum, Quantum Computing a IonQ)
articles.title: Šéf NVIDIA říká, že kvantové počítače nebudou ještě 20 let moc užitečné

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Ubuntu zvažuje nevydávat v průběhu víkendu stabilní aktualizace (SRU,  stable release updates) a zároveň zajistit, aby počítadlo pro postupné aktualizace (phased updates) nedosáhlo 100 %. Navrženo je od pátku 0 UTC do pondělí 12 UTC.
articles.title: Ubuntu zvažuje snížit počet aktualizací během víkendů

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Linux Foundation a Google včera oznámily iniciativu podpůrců prohlížečů založených na Chromiu (Supporters of Chromium-Based Browsers). Chromium je open source prohlížeč a z 94 % do něj přispívá Google. Dalšími velkými přispěvateli jsou Microsoft, Opera, Igalia a Samsung.
articles.title: Linux Foundation a Google založily iniciativu podpůrců prohlížečů založených na Chromiu

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Švýcarský Proton, poskytující služby Mail, Calendar, VPN, Drive, Pass a Wallet zaměřené na soukromí, měl včera globální výpadek. Problémy začaly okolo 16 hodiny našeho času a byly odstraněny v 19:27 našeho času.

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Redakce)
articles.description: Docker je dnes technologie, která proces vývoje, testování a provozování softwaru velmi zjednodušuje. Provozujte cokoliv a kdekoliv. Už nečekejte na nastavení svého serveru nebo na aktualizaci nějaké knihovny. Mějte prostředí jako součást vaší aplikace.

Synology globálně spouští ActiveProtect: zjednodušená ochrana podnikových dat. Dell zjednoduší své portfolio počítačů a laptopů. Svět hrozeb: Deepfake, zneužití umělé inteligence, ale i útoky na kritickou infrastrukturu. DiskStation Manager a pevné disky Synology. Fortinet zvyšuje zabezpečení a výkon webových aplikací.

articles.author: bkralik
articles.description:
Baví vás bastlení, fyzika, IT a nebo prostě cokoliv technického? Proseděli jste celé Vánoce v záři obrazovky počítače a nebo jste o tom alespoň snili? Chcete se pochlubit technickými vánočními dárky? Pak doražte na Virtuální Bastlírnu - online pokec (nejen) techniků a bastlířů!


Pokud by se konverzace zadrhla, mají organizátoři ze Strahovské Bastlírny připravena i náhradní výplňová témata. Velká studnice je to, co se dělo na hackerské konferenci CCC (Chaos Communication Conference) mezi svátky - mluvilo se tam o tom, jak se dá shodit rozvodná síť po rádiu, jak hacknout nový procesor Raspberry RP2350 a o tom jak pokračuje hackování vlaků v Polsku.


I na svět hardware jsou Strahováci připraveni. Na internetu se objevil postup, jak "snadno" vyrábět doma plošné spoje s pomocí výkonného vláknového laseru. Také se v diskuzi našel skvělý spis o tom, jak poznat falešné teploměry DS18B20 a co to vlastně znamená.


A nebojte, i na bizár může dojít. Věděli jste, že největší sériově vyráběná CRT televize váží přibližně 200 kilogramů a na světě se už ví jenom o jedné existující? A že Windows interně zkoušejí konvertovat znaky z UTF-16 do ASCII podle jejich grafické podobnosti, což vede k velkému množství elegantních exploitů?


Příští Virtuální Bastlírna se pod taktovkou projektu MacGyver studentského klubu SiliconHill bude konat v úterý 14. ledna od 20:00 (pozor, změna) minimálně do 22:00 (ale obvykle končí o dost později). Odkaz na konferenci se před samotnou akcí objeví na bastlířské wiki.
articles.title: Virtuální Bastlírna vol. 46: Co jste programovali o Vánocích?

There were nice Intel GPU compute optimizations merged over the past month to improve the experience. Here are some Linux graphics/gaming benchmarks for the Intel Arc B580 comparing the prior launch day Linux driver performance to where the Mesa performance is at now...

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: ARM64 ILP32 is the Armv8 architecture with a 32-bit ABI rather than 64-bit -- akin to the "x32" x86 effort that never really took off on Linux. ARM64 ILP32 support never ended up making it into the mainline Linux kernel or GNU C Library but did appear within the GNU Compiler Collection. But years later and little use, GCC developers are consider deprecating ILP32 support ahead of its eventual removal...
articles.title: GCC Developers Consider Deprecating ARM64 ILP32 Support

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Back in 2022 there were Linux kernel developers like Linux's second-in-command Greg Kroah-Hartman recommending that Intel Alder Lake laptops be avoided. This was due to the Intel web camera support in those new-at-the-time laptops yet to be properly upstreamed and relying on binary bits. Over time that Intel IPU6 MIPI camera support has seen portions of the code upstreamed into the mainline Linux kernel and distributions like Fedora taking extra steps to make them work but still in 2025 those with newer Intel laptops boasting the latest web camera technology are often facing a challenging experience...

If this is indeed the case, that would mean the fictional nation of Marley is parallel with Africa, the Middle Ea…

articles.author: Joseph Luster
articles.description:
Lil Gator Game previously kept the whimsical fun going with additions like New Game+ and Baby Mode. Now, it's getting ready to explore the world further with a "huge game expansion" called In the Dark.


According to developer MegaWobble, the In the Dark expansion doubles the size of Lil Gator Game. As the title and key art implies, this one takes our adorable hero underground to explore caves, with the promise of meeting a bunch of new characters in the process. You can head underground for yourself in the announcement trailer below.




The new content is located on the main island within a previously blocked entrance. In addition to the new friends awaiting Lil Gator, there are also some teenage ne'er-do-wells threatening to put a stop to the cozy frivolity to which we've become so thoroughly accustomed. New item types, a ribbon-powered double jump, and more are on the way to add to the exploratory opportunities. 


Lil Gator Game: In the Dark is currently in the works for PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S and Nintendo Switch. At the time of this writing, there's no release date in place for the expansion, but there are options for both newcomers and returning players. The expansion will arrive alongside a 'Gator of the Year Edition' of the main game that bundles it with all the new content. 


In the meantime, if you want to see if the game is right for you, you can always check it out on Game Pass. 

The post Lil Gator Game reveals ‘huge’ In the Dark expansion appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Lil Gator Game reveals ‘huge’ In the Dark expansion

Treyarch has been good to Zombie fans with the massive overhauling of Black Ops 6 maps and quality-of-life updates. Season 2 aims to bring even more to the table, introducing The Tomb, an ancient burial site overrun by hordes of zombies. 


As a catacombs-based location, The Tomb reminds me of the good old days with Black Ops 2's Zombies Buried map. However, this area seems a bit more open, as you have the free range to go deep in the catacombs or outside an excavation site. According to the Call of Duty Blog, The Tomb feels a little like Liberty Falls, as it features a similar tight space layout that'll make exploring all the more challenging.


Image via Activision

articles.author: Arka Sarkar
articles.description:
The Heian Sukuna Moveset is now live in Jujutsu Shenanigans, and you can get it quite easily on a private server.


The move set is one of the many additions made as part of the latest update. While the process isn't impossibly difficult by any means, it's not exactly easy as well. Let's take a look at how you can obtain this moveset in a private server.


How to obtain the Heian Sukuna Moveset in Jujutsu Shenanigans (Private Server)


Having a private server allows you certain extra benefits. For example, you can spawn certain things as you want. The first step to get the moveset is to spawn four blocks in a line. Make sure there is space between them. Select the first moveset and scroll down to Divergent. Once found, assign 5 to this Move Key.


Do the same for the next one, and assign 6 to it. Change the Input ID to two letters, and they can be as per your choice. But do remember to make them the same for all. Increase the size of the blocks to make them bigger than your character.




Now, add a touch block to cover all four blocks, and enter the Output ID. This should be the same as the Input ID that you set for all four moveset blocks. Next, just walk through all the boxes, and you'll have your moveset.


If you're wondering why you need to do this in a private server, the reason is simple: it's unavailable in the full game. Once the next update is available, you should be able to unlock the Heian Era Sukuna moveset in the full game. Till then, the private server is the only available option if you want to test out its strengths and weaknesses.

The post How To Get Heian Era Sukuna Moveset In Jujutsu Shenanigans appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: How To Get Heian Era Sukuna Moveset In Jujutsu Shenanigans

The TOTY Warmup Challenge SBC has been released in EA FC 25, and you can complete this fodder challenge for a bonus pack.

Let's take a look at how you can complete the challenge, along with all the available rewards. 


EA FC 25 TOTY Warmup Challenge SBC tasks


The TOTY Warmup Challenge SBC has one task, and here are the requirements. 


Task - TOTY Warmup Challenge SBC 



Max. Nationalities in Squad: 4


Min. 4 Players from the same League


Min. 3 Players from the same Club

EA FC 25 TOTY Warmup Challenge SBC solutions


Here's a set of solution you can use to complete the latest fodder challenge. While you should use items that are already available in your club, you can also use the following solution in case you get stuck. 


Task - TOTY Warmup Challenge SBC 



Morata ST 83


Denis Suarez LM 75


Fratessi CAM 81


Araya CAM 80


Ane Azkona RM 80


Rosucci CM 81


Adria Pedrosa LB 76


Maria Mendez CB 79


Raul Albiol CB 79

If you want to maximize your chances of packing a TOTY card, you should save this pack till those items are in packs.

Tennis fans looking to watch the 2025 Australian Open via the official livestream will come across a change that might have them worrying about their sanity.


As you can check right now on the tournament's official YouTube channel, the players you know to be human have been replaced by animated overlays of models resembling those seen on Wii Sports. 




Hilariously, even the real ball has been replaced by the overlay of a CGI ball, you know, maybe to avoid making it too jarring.


It turns out this happens because the Australian Open somehow doesn’t own all of its own broadcasting rights, so it has resorted to showing you real-time Wii-fied versions of the players on YouTube to appease the copyright gods. It’s the beautifully hilarious video game adaptation you didn’t know you wanted.

Though Dizzy has chosen not to reveal what's gone down, they've been adamant that he deserves the punishment even though that part of their life is in the past: "I do not have a sex crime. articles.author: Filip Galekovic
articles.description:
Even though Lovecraft might've been an indubitably racist author, others have built upon his legacy to create a genuinely compelling library of cosmic horror media. Very few games truly drive home how horrific it is to live alongside Lovecraft's monstrosities, however, and Cyclopean: The Great Abyss may correct that.


Frankly, I can't help but be surprised that we haven't yet had an honest-to-goodness cosmic horror dungeon crawler. That's what Cyclopean: The Great Abyss is, of course, but just look at it! How has nobody else come up with this particular concept before? Thankfully, small-scale developer Schmidt Workshops is here to correct that wrong, and I think there's some real merit in this project beyond its impeccable vibes.


Image via Schmidt Workshops


Cyclopean: The Great Abyss …

Most of the additions simply make this over two-decade old JRPG more …

But I found the angle of placing the story and its direction more in the player's hands an exciting and enjoyable way to push the hack-and-slash series forward in terms of storytelling.


Thankfully, de…
articles.title: Review: Dynasty Warriors: Origins

articles.author: Zoey Handley
articles.description:
In a trailer published through IGN, Kaizen Game Works (developers of Paradise Killer) has revealed some of the voice cast for Promise Mascot Agency. I hope you’re ready for some recognizable tongues in your ears.


Most prominently, the leading dude, Michi, is getting vocalized by Takaya Kuroda, the voice of Kazama Kiryu in the Yakuza/Like a Dragon series. What better person to play a disgraced Yakuza? No one. There is no one better, because he plays the best one. I don’t know how else to describe this, but he has a huggable voice. If you’re not a hugger; a high-fiveable voice.


Trailer via IGN


The other revealed cast members are no slouches, either. Pinky (that bizarre severed finger mascot that features so much in the marketing) is voiced by Ayano Shibuya, who was featured in The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild and Princess Peach: Showtime. If you don’t recognize her, it’s probably because you weren’t playing in Japanese. There’s also Eri Saito, who voiced so much in Japanese gaming, but you’d maybe recognize her from Way of the Samurai 3. No? Okay, Chainsaw Man, where she played Aki’s Mother.


On top of the famous vocalists, there are less conventional choices. This includes Swery65, who isn’t really known for voice acting, but did create Deadly Premonition. And then there’s. Wait. Shuhei Yoshida? Haha, really? The former president of Sony Interactive Entertainment.


If you’re not familiar, Promise Mascot Agency is a game about a former Yakuza running an, er, agency for mascots. The big foam costume kind. You have to send them out to various events and help them succeed. You also get to drive around in a Kei truck, which is an important touch.


Promise Mascot Agency is set for release on PS5, Xbox Series X|S, Switch, and PC sometime this year (2025).

The post Promise Mascot Agency’s insultingly star-studded voice cast includes Swery65 and the voice of Kazama Kiryu appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Promise Mascot Agency’s insultingly star-studded voice cast includes Swery65 and the voice of Kazama Kiryu

articles.author: Filip Galekovic
articles.description:
Hyper Light Breaker sure looks neat, right? Well, that neatness comes at a steep, steep performance cost, as the game is extremely hard to run. The apparent lack of performance optimization isn't the only problem, either, as the game doesn't even have a proper graphics settings menu to begin with.


I really do hate to rag on the developer Heart Machine for this, but the fact of the matter is that Hyper Light Breaker hasn't gotten off on the right foot. On top of its "Mixed" review rating on Steam, I can attest to it being totally unplayable on the Steam Deck. Even at the absolute lowest settings, Valve's handheld can barely eke out an unstable 15-30 FPS. This is particularly disappointing because Heart Machine specifically mentioned back in December that Hyper Light Breaker should run wel…
articles.title: Hyper Light Breaker runs very badly on PC and Steam Deck, but FPS improvements are coming

articles.author: Paula Vaynshteyn
articles.description:
Gordon Ramsay is infamous for being the foul-mouthed, though well-meaning restaurateur responsible for Kitchen Nightmares, Hotel Hell, and Hell’s Kitchen. In a move that possibly nobody expected, he’s been temporarily toned down and is guest-starring in mobile farming sim Hay Day. 


Yes, you read that correctly. Fans spotted the interesting development before the official announcement came from Supercell via Facebook, with some taking to Reddit to voice their confusion as to why Greg’s Farm was now “Gordon Ramsay’s Farm” before the new name temporarily disappeared with zero explanation. 




In the early hours of January 15, Supercell revealed that Gordon Ramsay was indeed coming to Hay Day on a temporary basis, filling in for Greg while he’s away on his fishing trip. Gordon will be around until January 24, helping players to look after their farms while bringing a host of time-limited events to complete and rewards to collect.


Of course, Supercell couldn’t let this moment slide without mentioning at least one of Gordon’s most infamous moments. At one point during the reveal as part of the latest installment of Dairy News, one presenter can be seen with a slice of bread being held on either side of her face, before she goes on to label herself a “confused sandwich”. This is tamer than the actual Kitchen Nightmares moment they’re paying homage to, when Gordon made a contestant cry while calling them an "idiot sandwich". 




I can't help but wonder how Gordon Ramsay, of all people, ended up in partnership with Hay Day, but in a separate trailer starring the man himself, he seems to be in search of inner peace, and Hay Day is definitely good for that. Creating your own idyllic farm and forming connections with others, looking after the animals, and making money by selling your produce definitely feels like a calming way of life.

The post The strangest collab of 2025? Gordon Ramsay finds peace with mobile game Hay Day appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: The strangest collab of 2025? Gordon Ramsay finds peace with mobile game Hay Day

articles.author: Annie Thelen

With The Sims franchise moving away from linear game releases and into the future, it’s not unusual to think that EA has simply abandoned the previous titles in the series. But, to everyone’s surprise, fans could rejoice that a new update was released for The Sims 3, the game’s first patch in ten years.


The patch, version number 1.69.47.024017, was released on January 13, 2025, with no prior warning. It was released to fix the Alder Lake bug, where Windows players with newer Alder Lake processors wouldn’t be able to run the game at all through the EA app. The patch now allows players to enjoy the game on their newer PCs.


EA quietly updates The Sims 3 for the first time in years so you can play on newer CPUs


The patch was released with no accompanying patch notes from EA, leaving it a…
articles.title: The Sims 3 gets an update after 10 years, your new PC is now good to go

articles.author: Kristina Ebanez
articles.description:
Unlike the straightforward cooking mechanics in many cozy games, Dreaming Isles' version presents a more intricate and challenging system. While it's simple enough to obtain a kitchen station, mastering the art of cooking in this game is a whole different story.


So, if you're a little confused about it, like I was, here's an explainer on how to cook in Dreaming Isles.


Dreaming Isles Cooking guide


The cooking station becomes accessible once you've unlocked the farmhouse. To cook in Dreaming Isles, you'll need to embark on a journey of exploration to find recipe books. The Tuna Steak recipe seems to unlock automatically, but you must repair your boat for better meals. For instance, I found the Swordfish Steak book near Freestad's dining hall and another for the Cooked Meat dish in Frey…
articles.title: How to cook in Dreaming Isles

Increase to Grade 3 by speakin…
articles.title: All Jujutsu Infinite Cursed Tools and how to get them

articles.author: Zoey Handley
articles.description:
Set some time aside in April, because GungHo has announced that the Lunar Remastered Collection will arrive on April 18, 2025 for PS4, Xbox One, Switch, and PC.


I feel like we keep getting Lunar re-releases, but I looked it up and the last one was actually in 2010 for the PSP. Or 2012 if you count mobile. Still, it’s seen a lot of second chances for a game that original released on Sega CD back in 1992.




Lunar Remastered Collection combines Lunar: The Silver Star and Lunar 2: Eternal Blue, or rather, the PS1 version of those. And while it’s titled “remastered” it largely has the same graphics as those releases with some added effects. It’s still 2D and pixelated, which is fine (or even preferred) by me, but doesn’t feel like it earns the title. Unless you count that gross depth-of-field effect they put on the top and bottom of the screen. I guess the cutscenes seem to be remastered, so it counts. Whatever, I'm not the remaster police.


It looks like you can turn off the gross depth-of-field effects, or, at the very least, play it in classic mode. This might also mean you lose the widescreen mode, but maybe you can tweak things. Either way, you’ll have the same classic games in a new package, so that’s worth a lot.


There will also be a physical version available for $54.99 USD. They will notably feature “reversible covers showcasing two new key arts for LUNAR: Silver Star Story Complete and Lunar 2: Eternal Blue Complete, both illustrated exclusively for the Lunar Remastered Collection by Toshiyuki Kubooka.”


Lunar Remastered Collection launches on April 18, 2025, for PS4, Xbox One, Switch, and PC.

The post Lunar Remastered Collection set for release in April appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Lunar Remastered Collection set for release in April

articles.author: Pam Ferdinand
articles.description:
One of the most horrifying things you’ll encounter as a newcomer to Fallout 76 is being perpetually over-encumbered. While it’s tempting to pick up every item you come across, your stash is limited to 2000 pounds, and that will get filled up more quickly than you expect. So, what items are useful to pick up as a low-level character in Fallout 76?


Items to repair your gear in Fallout 76


Of utmost importance will be those items that you can scrap for components to repair your weapons and armor. Up until level 15, you’ll first use Wood, Leather, or Raider Armor and eventually Metal. For the most part, your weapons will likely be a pipe pistol/rifle, regular pistol/rifle, a melee weapon, and maybe a laser pistol/rifle.


All these items require Adhesive to repair, and it will be your most …
articles.title: A beginner in Fallout 76: What junk items should you keep?

articles.author: Elliott Gatica
articles.description:
The first event of 2025 is coming to Warframe, starting with the Lunar New Year. It isn’t as major as the anniversary of the game, but there are still many things to look forward to.


That being said, here’s everything you need to know about the event.


Warframe Lunar New Year event start date


The Lunar New Year event in Warframe will begin on January 15, 2025. Bundles, floofs, skins, and other cosmetics will appear in the shop.


This event should run until February 15, so there will be plenty of time to get the alerts done and maybe amass enough Platinum to snag some of the limited-time cosmetics.


Image via Digital Extremes


What skins are coming to the event?


Right now, it seems that only Mirage will be getting a new themed skin for the event. Frames from previous years who got skins include Saryn, Chroma, and Grendel, which they may return in.


We’ll also see the following items and skins in the three bundles:



Charming Snake Floof


Hespar Lunaeus Skin (melee weapon skin)


Cordmade Sugatra (melee attachment skin)


Lunar Renewal Snake Flourish


Lunar Renewal Snake Sigil


Lunar New Year Renewal Theme


Mirage Nuwa Floof


Boltor Lunaeus Skin


Moondance Kavat Armor


Heaven Stones Ephemera



These will all be sold in three separate bundles, but are likely to be sold individually as well. All bundles coming with these items will also give you some form of in-game currency, mods, or materials. 


Are there any free items?


For people who want something to grind for, there isn’t much to look forward to other than getting the new Yisi Glyph for your profile icon or the Lunar Renewal Snake Emblem, which will be available via alerts.


You’ll have more than enough time to at least get some items out of this event, but get on it if you don’t want to miss out!

The post Warframe Lunar New Year event 2025: Start date, skins, and more appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Warframe Lunar New Year event 2025: Start date, skins, and more

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Telegram is one of the most popular messaging tools, chosen by many online services to stay connected with their audiences. Major shadow libraries Z-Library and Anna's Archive used Telegram until this week, when both accounts were terminated for copyright infringement. While these websites offer infringing content, both were cautious to avoid copyright troubles on Telegram.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Telegram Shuts Down Z-Library & Anna’s Archive Channels Over Copyright Infringement

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
With considerable encouragement from Hollywood and affiliated anti-piracy groups, in 2021 the Malaysian government stepped up its site blocking measures. An official statement published this week reveals that between 2021 and November 2024, a total of 3,682 pirate sites were blocked to prevent exploitation of local content. Interesting, perhaps, but after 15 years of effort, did site-blocking actually work and, if so, who benefited, and how?
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: 3,682 Pirate Sites Blocked to Protect Creators; More Importantly, Did it Work?

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
In its annual report published last week, the U.S. Government listed MagisTV as one of the most notorious piracy services. The mention comes after the IPTV provider, which is mainly popular in Latin America, boldly applied for a U.S. trademark. This trademark is unlikely to be granted without protest, but that doesn't seem to be a major issue; the service has already rebranded itself as FlujoTV.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: ‘Notorious’ Pirate IPTV Service MagisTV Applies for US Trademark and Rebrands

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Every week we take a close look at the most pirated movies on torrent sites. What are pirates downloading? 'Gladiator II' tops the chart, followed by 'Venom: The Last Dance'. 'Mufasa: The Lion King' completes the top three.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Top 10 Most Pirated Movies of The Week – 01/13/2025

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
Making use of free Wi-Fi offered by pubs, bars, cafés, and other businesses, is now an everyday event for millions of people. For the owner of the 3 Little Piggies café in Cork, Ireland, providing free Wi-Fi led to an allegation of music piracy from his ISP and advance notice of potential disconnection. What followed was an extremely rare apology, for reasons deserving of a much closer look.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: ISP Huffs and Puffs Then Apologizes to 3 Little Piggies Over Pirate Downloads

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
With billions of annual visits, MissAV ranks among the 60 most-visited websites on the internet. The porn site mostly caters to an Asian audience where rightsholders see the 'pirate' site as a major threat to their business. Through a legal procedure, adult entertainment company FANZA 'confiscated' the MissAV.com domain, as well as ThisAV.com. However, MissAV swiftly bounced back on a new domain.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: MissAV: One of the World’s Largest ‘Pirate’ Sites Targeted in Takedown Effort

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Nhentai.net, a popular adult site with dozens of millions of monthly visits, has asked a California federal court to dismiss a piracy lawsuit filed last year by publisher PCR Distributing. Among other things, the site argues that PCR lack sufficient ownership of the copyrights in question and has previously granted permission for the use of the content.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Nhentai Asks California Court to Dismiss Piracy Lawsuit

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
In terms of popularity and daily usage, the mighty gTLD .com and the lesser-known ccTLD .to sit in stark contrast. DomainTools currently reports over 154 million registered .com domains, 129,000 of those registered in the last day alone. Total number of registered .to domains is just 26,000, available from a website that has barely changed in over 25 years. So if we rule out an appreciation of 1997 web design, what fuels pirate sites' enduring love affair with .to?
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Tonga! Tonga! Tonga! Online Piracy’s Unusual Attraction to ccTLD .to

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Adult entertainment company Strike 3 Holdings is once again the most prolific copyright litigant in the United States. The company tracks down individual pirates and holds them responsible via copyright infringement lawsuits. The company is linked to over 3,900 lawsuits filed in 2024 alone, breaking its own record once again.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: ‘Strike 3’ Filed a Record Number of Piracy Lawsuits in 2024

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
According to the MPA, in 2023 video hosting platform DoodStream received 2.69 billion visits, largely driven by pirated content. So when the High Court of Delhi gave the site's operators 24 hours to end infringement in March 2024, that looked promising. Yet the site remains online, despite subsequent High Court orders. According to site's Indian operators, it is not possible to comply with High Court orders because a major DoodStream investor comes from Russia.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: DoodStream Can’t Comply With Court Orders, Major Investor is a Russian Dude

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
The Electronic Frontier Foundation (EFF) has got involved in a lawsuit between several movie companies and ISP Cox, who disagree over the use of DMCA subpoenas to identify alleged pirates.  The EFF argues this could be abused by "copyright trolls" to target innocent users. They urge the court to require a full lawsuit with judicial oversight.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: EFF Sides with Cox to Protect Piracy-Accused Internet Users from ‘Copyright Trolls’

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
The Office of the United States Trade Representative has published its annual list of problematic piracy websites and other "notorious markets." This year's overview includes the usual suspects operating in the torrent and streaming sectors, as well as some intermediaries, including various hosting companies. The USTR hopes that by highlighting the threats, platform operators or foreign authorities will take action.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: U.S. Trade Representative Lists the Most Notorious Piracy Threats

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
In the wake of Russia's invasion of Ukraine, the EU banned a number of Russian news outlets from broadcasting to any member state, including via websites and IPTV. Following a recent move by Lithuania, Google has reportedly deindexed over 200 websites offering EU-sanctioned content. The list includes the websites of specific broadcasters but also many portals offering pirated movies, TV shows, and unlicensed live TV streams, including some from Ukraine.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Google Deindexes 200 Streaming Sites For Violating EU Sanctions on Russia

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
In the live sports broadcasting arena, dynamic blocking of pirate IPTV streams is seen as increasingly useful to tackle a prevalent and highly resilient form of illicit content delivery. Yet as the highly-publicized blunders of 2024 showed, getting blocking wrong benefits nobody. To that background, a blocking specialist at anti-piracy company Friend MTS is encouraging restraint.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: IPTV Piracy Expert Urges Restraint in Rush Towards Automated Blocking

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Italy's 'Piracy Shield' blocking system was originally invented to protect time-sensitive live sports streams from pirates. A year later, rightsholders are pushing for an update to cover a wider range of content, including films. This move, which is expected to be discussed in a forthcoming consultation, aims to gradually expand the 'next-gen' blocking system.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Anti-Piracy Group Wants to Expand Italy’s ‘Piracy Shield’ to Protect Movies

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
York Crown Court has sentenced a man from Halifax to two years in prison for selling 'pirate' IPTV subscriptions loaded on Fire Sticks. Rightsholders and authorities hope that the criminal prosecution of the 41-year-old (re)seller, who served a few hundred customers, will send a deterrent message. However, the big fish in this hugely profitable industry remain unscathed. 
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: UK Court Sentences ‘Pirate’ Fire Stick Seller to Two Years in Prison

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
Many sites have laid claim to the title of most popular pirate site but traffic data being reported by SimilarWeb for streaming site HiAnime.to is on a whole new level. After pulling in 302 million visits in September, the pirate streaming site added almost 62 million more in October. That earns the platform a GlobalRank of 120, and a U.S. streaming sector rank higher than Disney Plus.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: HiAnime Outranks DisneyPlus in the U.S. With a Record 364m Monthly Visits

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
In a continued effort to combat online piracy, Japanese publishing giant Shueisha has requested a DMCA subpoena to compel X to expose two 'pirate accounts'. This is the latest move to identify the operators of major manga pirate portals through U.S. federal courts. If the operators of Spoilerplus and Mangaraw are identified, they could potentially be sued in Japan.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Manga Publisher Shueisha Wants X to Expose ‘One Piece’ Pirates

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
In 2022, a group of Israel-based TV companies obtained a court order in the U.S. It compelled every ISP in the country to block three resilient pirate sites that blocking in Israel had failed to stop. Intervention by Cloudflare ended that dream and 2.5 years later, despite other measures targeting the sites, it appears that at least one is still going strong. The TV companies are now taking legal action against UK ISPs; they're unlikely to put up a fight, they may not even turn up in court.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: TV Group Couldn’t Force U.S. ISPs to Block Pirates, UK ISPs May Offer Help

articles.author: nospam@scummvm.org (criezy)

articles.description: Ho, ho, ho, Santa is in town. And he’s brought a gift with him. Here’s a shiny new package for you to unwrap, containing the first beta version of the upcoming OpenTTD 15 release. It comes faster, with road waypoints, fewer passwords, better scenario editor, and hopefully with a lot less bugs. To be a bit less vague, here are some of the highlights: Improved picker windows for stations/waypoints/objects/and more. Oh, and that does include road waypoints. Better perfomance in various places, including faster path signals that are now green by default. Password-less network authentication using keys. Several improvements for NewGRFs regarding cargo support. Better scenario editor with a town data importer and manual house placement. A large tree fully hung with ornamental bugfixes. Sadly though, not everbody was good this year. The old NPF pathfinder was finally retired, after YAPF being the superior default for many, many years now. There’s a lot of bugs left for you to find, though, guaranteed. Enjoy the beta, test all the things and report anything you find amiss, to make OpenTTD 15 the best OpenTTD 15 ever. Download Changelog Bug tracker
articles.title: OpenTTD 15.0-beta1

articles.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)
articles.description: Z "Párty Hárd" jsem byl nadšen, ale tohle jako kdyby natočil (a především napsal) někdo úplně jiný. Ano, vizuálně to vypadá o něco profesionálněji, ale jaksi se vytratila většina chytřejšího humoru a zůstaly jen "věci na jistotu" jako sprostá mluva, zvracení a fekálie. Ve filmu je mnoho víceminutových scén, při kterých se NIKDO v plném sále ani neuchechtl, a to je tohoto typu snímku na pováženou. (Ilča 40 %)
articles.title: Audio recenze: Na plech - 40 %

articles.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)
articles.description: Série působivých obrazů a scén, tentokrát z Neapole. Pořád je to "typický Sorrentino" a pravděpodobně bych to poznal i kdybych to předem nevěděl. Ale je to výrazně snesitelnější než "Oni a Silvio", především proto, že hlavní hrdinka to celé nějakým smysluplným způsobem spojuje. (Ilča 60 %)
articles.title: Audio recenze: Parthenope - 70 %

articles.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)
articles.description:
Následuje neupravovaný text zajímavého prohlášení, které vydal můj oblíbenec Varhan Orchestrovič Bauer k nové verzi slovenské hymny:


S úctou a upřímnou pokorou jsem přistoupil k aranžmá národní slovenské hymny "Nad Tatrou sa blýská" již v roce 2016. Hudebně vychází z původní lidové písně a již dávno zažité sestupné basové linky původně inspirované čardášem. V monumentální instrumentaci zaznívá důstojné a bohaté "hradní" Maestoso s výraznou smyčcovou figurací a dramatické Presto s vypjatým protihlasem tak kontrastně jako dunajské nížiny a Vysoké Tatry. Důvodem vzniku bylo hledání krásy a síly slovenské hudby s duchovním nadhledem mně tolik blízké mahlerovské angažovanosti. Velmi důležitá při tom pro mě byla noblesa a hudební kultivovanost při zachování původní písně. Nový rozměr je u mě h…
articles.title: Prohlášení k nové verzi slovenské hymny

articles.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)
articles.description: Jarcovjáková je zajímavá postava (byť postava, se kterou bych nikdy v životě nechtěl osobně komunikovat), její fotografie stojí za povšimnutí a způsob zpracování tohoto dokumentu je téměř geniální. Nemyslel bych si, že devadesátiminutová sekvence statických fotografií s hudbou, zvukovými efekty a vyprávěním může tak dobře fungovat. (Ilča 70 %)
articles.title: Audio recenze: Ještě nejsem, kým chci být - 80 %

articles.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)
articles.description: Kvalitní herecké výkony a režie, ale v ostatních ohledech (např. scénář, kamera...) nic zajímavého. Hlavní hrdinka se trápí, trápí, a trápí... až je konec. Trápení je v průběhu filmu trochu permutováno, ale jde pouze o střípky, které (záměrně?) nevytvářejí žádný dramatický celek, natož zápletku. (Ilča 50 %)
articles.title: Audio recenze: Rok vdovy - 70 %

articles.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)
articles.description: Z dosavadních Eggersových filmů je tento nejméně autorský, nejméně konzistentní a nejvíce působí jako kdyby do jeho vzniku někdo kecal ohledně jeho komerčního potenciálu. Výsledek je tudíž poněkud schizofrenní, chvíli artový, chvíli komerční, a nepříjemně rozvleklý. (Ilča 70 %)
articles.title: Audio recenze: Nosferatu - 60 %

articles.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)
articles.description: Učebnicový příklad toho, jak někdo viděl fungující originál ("Sentimental", Španělsko 2020) a natočil jeho český "srandovnější" remake, aniž by chápal proč a jak ten originál fungoval. (Ilča 30 %)
